FuncDef: This command modifies the Originating IP field advertised in the ES route for a given Ethernet Segment. By default, the Originating IP is the system-ip of the PE. However, this value can be changed to the IPv4 or IPv6 address configured with this command.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an IPv4 or IPv6 address. Values-{ip-address | ipv6-address}.
